name: Orange & Bergamot Body Lotion | Handmade In Ireland
description:
Christmas Shipping Dates 2013 - To ensure you get your order by 24th December, please order by the following dates;

Ireland & UK - December 19th

Europe - December 13th

USA & Rest of World - December 6th

A little goes a long way!  Due to the concentrated nature of natural products, you will only need to use a small amount.  

This non greasy body lotion has an uplifting citrus scent, packed with antioxidants, rejuvenating, nutrient-rich and healing ingredients.  Massage into your skin after showering or bathing.

******** Sustainable Beauty Awards Silver Winner 2013 for Eco Packaging ********

******** Featured in Vogue, Cosmopolitan and Couch Magazine ********

Spring water (aqua), *Almond Oil (Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis), *Thistle Oil (Carthamus Tinctorius), *Glycerine, *Aloe Vera Concentrate, *Aloe Vera Gel (Aloe Barbadensis), Vitamin E (Tocopherol) 
Essential Oils: *Neroli (Citrus Aurantium) *Bergamot (Citrus Bergamia) Bergapten free, *Orange (Citrus Sinensis)

*Organic

FREE FROM: SLS, Artificial fragrance, Mineral Oils, Animal Testing

300ml/10fl.oz

name: Orange & Ylang Ylang Night Balm | Handmade In Ireland
description:
Christmas Shipping Dates 2013 - To ensure you get your order by 24th December, please order by the following dates;

Ireland & UK - December 19th

Europe - December 13th

USA & Rest of World - December 6th

A little goes a long way! Due the the concentrated nature of natural products, you will only need to use a small amount.  Massage into cleansed skin every night for dry skin and just 2 - 3 times per week for oily skin.

This super rich nourishing and rejuvenating night balm is packed with anti-oxidents, a blend of protecting and skin softening ingredients which will leaves your skin smooth and radiant. Can be also used as a treatment balm for dry patches on the body. Men can use this as a soothing aftershave balm.

There is evidence that skin cells regenerate faster at night then during the day.  Cell division happens throughout the day, but peaks around 2 a.m.

*Jojoba Oil (Simmondsia Chinensis), *Beeswax (Cera Alba), *Coconut Oil (Cocos Nucifera), * Cocoa Butter (Theobroma Cacao) *Aloe Vera Concentrate (Aloe Barbadensis), Vitamin E (Tocopherol)
Essentail Oils: *Neroli (Citrus Aurantium), *Bergamot (Citrus Bergamia) Bergapten free, *Ylang Ylang (Cananga Odorata Genuina), *Benzoin (Styrax Tonkinensis) *Rosemary Antioxident (Rosmarinus officinalis)

*Organic 

FREE FROM: SLS, Artificial fragrance, Mineral Oils, Animal Testing

20ml 0.7 fl.oz.

Body Lotion

Night Balm

Massage into cleansed skin every night for dry skin and just 2 - 3 times per week for oily skin.

This super rich nourishing and rejuvenating night balm is packed with antioxidents, a blend of protecting and skin softening ingredients which will leaves your skin smooth and radiant. name: YouOrganic Custom Formulation
description:
Following a detailed one hour personal consultation via Skype with our licensed Aesthetician you will receive a Bespoke blend for your distinctive skin type.  Please e-mail us to book your appointment

GMT  9a.m. - 10p.m.
PST   9a.m. - 5p.m.
EST  11a.m. - 5p.m.
